contract implements the IRaft interface and inherits access control from ArkAccessManaged.","errors":{"AccessControlBadConfirmation()":[{"details":"The caller of a function is not the expected one. NOTE: Don't confuse with {AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount}."}],"AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount(address,bytes32)":[{"details":"The `account` is missing a role."}]},"events":{"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted signaling this."},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call, an admin role bearer except when using {AccessControl-_setupRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"constructor":{"params":{"_swapProvider_":"The address of the swap provider (e.g., 1inch) used for token exchanges.","accessManager":"The address of the AccessManager contract for role-based permissions."}},"getHarvestedRewards(address,address)":{"details":"This function allows querying the balance of harvested rewards before deciding on further actions.","params":{"ark":"The address of the Ark contract.","rewardToken":"The address of the reward token."},"returns":{"_0":"The amount of harvested rewards for the specified Ark and token."}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantCommanderRole(address)":{"params":{"account":"The account to which the Commander role will be granted"}},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Overrides the grantRole function from AccessControl to disable direct role granting."},"harvest(address,address,bytes)":{"details":"This function only collects rewards, storing them in the Raft contract for later use.","params":{"ark":"The address of the Ark contract to harvest rewards from.","extraHarvestData":"Additional data required by a protocol to harvest","rewardToken":"The address of the reward token to be harvested."}},"harvestAndBoard(address,address,(address,uint256,uint256,bytes),bytes)":{"details":"Only callable by addresses with the Keeper role.","params":{"ark":"The address of the Ark contract to harvest rewards from.","extraHarvestData":"Additional data required by a protocol to harvest","rewardToken":"The address of the reward token to be harvested and swapped.","swapData":"Data required for the swap operation, including the target token and minimum received amount."}},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeCommanderRole(address)":{"params":{"account":"The account from which the Commander role will be revoked"}},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Overrides the revokeRole function from AccessControl to disable direct role revoking."},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"swapAndBoard(address,address,(address,uint256,uint256,bytes))":{"details":"Only callable by addresses with the Keeper role.","params":{"ark":"The address of the Ark contract to reinvest into.","rewardToken":"The address of the harvested reward token to be swapped.","swapData":"Data required for the swap operation, including the target token and minimum received amount."}}},"title":"Raft","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"constructor":{"notice":"Constructs a new Raft contract."},"getHarvestedRewards(address,address)":{"notice":"Retrieves the amount of harvested rewards for a specific Ark and reward token."},"grantCommanderRole(address)":{"notice":"Grants the Commander role to a given account"},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"notice":"This function always reverts with a DirectGrantIsDisabled error."},"harvest(address,address,bytes)":{"notice":"Harvests rewards from the specified Ark without swapping or reinvesting."},"harvestAndBoard(address,address,(address,uint256,uint256,bytes),bytes)":{"notice":"Harvests rewards from the specified Ark, swaps them, and reinvests the proceeds."},"revokeCommanderRole(address)":{"notice":"Revokes the Commander role from a given account"},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"notice":"This function always reverts with a DirectRevokeIsDisabled error."},"swapAndBoard(address,address,(address,uint256,uint256,bytes))":{"notice":"Swaps previously harvested rewards and reinvests them into the specified Ark."}},"notice":"Manages the harvesting, swapping, and reinvesting of rewards for various params._swapProvider_: The address of the swap provider (e.g., 1inch) used for token exchanges.
params.accessManager: The address of the AccessManager contract for role-based permissions.

getHarvestedRewards(address,address).details: This function allows querying the balance of harvested rewards before deciding on further actions.

params.ark: The address of the Ark contract.
params.rewardToken: The address of the reward token.

returns._0: The amount of harvested rewards for the specified Ark and token.

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

params.account: The account to which the Commander role will be granted

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Overrides the grantRole function from AccessControl to disable direct role granting.

harvest(address,address,bytes).details: This function only collects rewards, storing them in the Raft contract for later use.

params.ark: The address of the Ark contract to harvest rewards from.
params.extraHarvestData: Additional data required by a protocol to harvest
params.rewardToken: The address of the reward token to be harvested.

harvestAndBoard(address,address,(address.details: Only callable by addresses with the Keeper role.

params.ark: The address of the Ark contract to harvest rewards from.
params.extraHarvestData: Additional data required by a protocol to harvest
params.rewardToken: The address of the reward token to be harvested and swapped.
params.swapData: Data required for the swap operation, including the target token and minimum received amount.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

params.account: The account from which the Commander role will be revoked

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Overrides the revokeRole function from AccessControl to disable direct role revoking.

swapAndBoard(address,address,(address,ui.details: Only callable by addresses with the Keeper role.

params.ark: The address of the Ark contract to reinvest into.
params.rewardToken: The address of the harvested reward token to be swapped.
params.swapData: Data required for the swap operation, including the target token and minimum received amount.

getHarvestedRewards(address,address).notice: Retrieves the amount of harvested rewards for a specific Ark and reward token.

grantCommanderRole(address).notice: Grants the Commander role to a given account

grantRole(bytes32,address).notice: This function always reverts with a DirectGrantIsDisabled error.

harvest(address,address,bytes).notice: Harvests rewards from the specified Ark without swapping or reinvesting.

harvestAndBoard(address,address,(address.notice: Harvests rewards from the specified Ark, swaps them, and reinvests the proceeds.

revokeCommanderRole(address).notice: Revokes the Commander role from a given account

revokeRole(bytes32,address).notice: This function always reverts with a DirectRevokeIsDisabled error.

swapAndBoard(address,address,(address,ui.notice: Swaps previously harvested rewards and reinvests them into the specified Ark.
